attributes.additional_details:
Remove  20 MPH limits from all  A and B roads and return those already in operation to previous speed limits.

I have no problem with 20 MPH limits on housing estates and side roads but after around a year of these limits on the main roads into and out of our village the standard of road use by all users from pedestrians to HGV drivers have got markedly worse, wile road rage, bullying tailgating, and general inconsiderate road use have massively increased, drivers are loosing concentration due to to low a speed so increasing the likelihood  of accidents.
